title: Madeline Kim
text:
Hi there!

I’m Madeline, a fourth-year at UCLA studying Statistics and Data Science.
 
  
   
  
     LinkedIn
  
  
     Email

title: Madeline Kim
text:
Work Experience
Currently, I work as a Data Consultant and the Technical Writer for the UCLA DataSquad, located in the UCLA Data Science Center in the Young Research Library.

title: About
text:
About me
I grew up in Oakland, California and am currently living in Los Angeles for school. After graduation, I will be moving to Madison, Wisconsin to work for Epic Healthcare Systems in Verona, WI.

  Me outside the Baked Potato!

Outside of school, I enjoy seeing live music and exploring LA’s many cafes and restaurants. My favorite restaurant in LA is Messob on Fairfax, as I have loved Ethiopian food since childhood, and I also enjoy the Alcove in Los Feliz or Layla’s Bagels in Santa Monica for brunch.

  The Super Messob Combo at Messob
